name: The Playtester
description:
You've been tasked with helping out a friend playtest their game on a new game engine. Use your investigative abilities to sort through menus, transfer files, dicipher code and using both the desktop and the in-game world to overcome any obstacles.

Controls:

Left Mouse button - manipulate objects

WASD - to move

SpaceBar - Interact with items

Esc - to exit game window

To Exit the game use Start then Power.

Created By:

Joe Jastrzembski

and

Joey Minor

Assets/sources Used: 

conifers (botd) by forst

outdoor ground textures by a dog's life software

grass and flowers pack 1 by vladislav pochezhertsev

old game stylized props pack by reach the end

sound assets used:

 free music tracks for games by rizwan ashraf

nature - essentials by nox_sound

Horror sound atmopheres and sfx by neocrey

Caesar Cipher - wikipedia page

Pixelation by Dmitry Timofeev

Free Pixel Font by Thaleah

A few Sounds from FreeSound.org
